title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Air Taxis & Flight Seeing
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outfitters and Guides     Air Taxis & Flight Seeing                Air Taxis and Flight Seeing        A flightseeing trip in the Wrangell Mountains is an Alaskan highlight! W. Forstner      One of the best ways to experience the beauty and tremendous size of this park is from above! Fly past massive peaks, over jagged glaciers, and endless expanses of wild Alaska! For the truly adventurous, air taxis are used for backcountry dropoffs for wilderness campers and backpackers. A wide variety of tours, trips, and itineraries are available Most operators fly out of Glennallen, McCarthy, or Chitina. For more information, contact one of the listed operators.       Map of Air Taxi Locations        GLENNALLEN/GULKANA/TOK AREA: Lee's Air Taxi (907) 822-3574 PO Box 148, Glennallen, AK 99588 www.leesairtaxi.com K-Air Service (907) 822-5312  HC 63, PO Box 1415, Gakona, AK 99586 McMahan Guide & Flying Service (907) 440-1510 PO Box MXY #1, Glennallen, AK 99588 Copper Valley Air Service (907) 822-4200 PO Box 234, Glennallen, AK 99588 www.coppervalleyairservice.com 40-Mile Air (907) 883-5191 PO Box 539, Tok, AK 99780 http://fortymileair.com Tok Air Service (907) 322-2903 PO Box 857, Tok, AK 99780 www.flytokair.com  MCCARTHY/KENNECOTT/CHITINA AREA: McCarthy Air (907) 554-4440 PO Box MXY #16, McCarthy, AK 99588 www.mccarthyair2.com Wrangell Mountain Air (907) 554-4411 PO Box MXY #25, McCarthy, AK 99588 www.wrangellmountainair.com Ultima Thule Outfitters Mountaineering Charters (907) 854-4500 PO Box 109, Chitina, AK 99566 www.ultimathulelodge.com  COASTAL AREAS: Alsek Air Service (907) 784-3231 PO Box 489, Yakutat, AK 99689 Yakutat Coastal Airlines (907) 784-3831 PO Box 326, Yakutat, AK 99689 www.flyyca.com Earth Center Adventures (907) 723-9475 PO Box 411, Haines, AK 99827 www.flydrake.com Mountain Flying Service (907) 766-3007 132 2nd Avenue, Haines, AK 99827 www.mountainflyingservice.com Alaskan Wilderness Outfitting (907) 424-5552 PO Box 1516, Cordova, AK 99574 www.alaskawilderness.com   OTHER AREAS: Sky Trekking Alaska (907) 315-6098 PO Box 871370, Wasilla, AK 99687 www.alaskaonthefly.com  These listings are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve.
